4306010.name: Turnt Arena: Perks or Perish
4306010.description:
TURNT Arena: Perks or Perish is an action roguelike MMO where you fight through endless waves of enemies, collect powerful perks, and push your build to the limit.

CHOOSE YOUR CLASS

Pick from multiple classes including Warrior, Paladin, Monk, and Warlock. Each class offers unique build advantages  and strategies.

BUILD YOUR POWER

Collect up to 100 perks per run. Every choice matters - will you stack damage, go tanky, or create deadly synergies?

CLIMB THE RANKS

Progress through Normal, Nightmare, Hell, and Endless difficulties. Compete on the leaderboards and prove you have what it takes.

GEAR UP

Farm bosses for powerful loot. Equip weapons, armor, and accessories to boost your stats and unlock new abilities.

PLAY YOUR WAY

- Online Mode: Join the MMO server, compete on leaderboards, and party up with friends

- Offline Mode: Play solo with local saves, still in early alpha, not all features available offline- no internet required

FACE THE TRIAL

Beat all 99 rounds? The Trial awaits. Only the strongest builds survive.

Key Features:

- 100 perks to collect each run

- Multiple character classes

- 4 difficulty modes + Endless mode

- Online Mode has loot and gear systems

- Party system for co-op play & Guilds
- Online PvP Dueling System available after completing Campaign! (Normal-Hell)

- Online Global leaderboards
- NEW rebirth system - Reroll all 100 perks


- Full Cross-Platform Multiplayer play TURNT Arena anywhere!! Optimized for Phones, Tablets, Mac, Windows, via Internet Browser. Log in via Steam after purchase or via a username/password.
